subject: Wrong order
description_text:
Hi there,

I made an order today #SSN5007 which was incorrect.
I was meant to order the Pro x Ultras.
I can pay the difference if i have a contact to do so.
Is it posible to change the order instead of returning it?



Kind regards
Danny Hartley

conversations.body_text: Hi Danny Hartley,    Alright, you can pay the $58.20 difference via this link. Please make the payment as soon as possible, and we'll ship your order promptly.

All paid.

Thank you for the quick response

Kind regards
Danny Hartley
Hi Danny Hartley,    Okay, we've shipped your order and updated the shipping notification.
